title: Cultural Traditions and Celebrations

vocab.definition: The way a group of people lives, including their customs and beliefs
Something that is passed down from older people to younger people
A special time when people come together to honor something important
A special way of doing things that people in a group share
The traditions and customs passed down from your family

teachingNotes: Explore different cultural celebrations and traditions represented in the classroom. Discuss how families celebrate holidays differently. Emphasize respect for all cultures and traditions.

sample.question: Name a celebration your family has.
Give an example of a custom.
Why is it important to respect other cultures?

truefalse.question: All families celebrate holidays in exactly the same way.
Trying new foods can teach us about culture.
Respect means making fun of others' customs.
Heritage is what families pass down.
Music and dance can be part of culture.

multiplechoice.question: Which is an example of a cultural tradition?
Which shows respect for another culture?
Which might be part of a celebration?
